task.title: Auto Provision Phone Firmware
task.shortdesc: You can update the phone firmware by Auto Provision method.

p.note: Auto provisioning phone firmware only works for the phones that were registered to the PBX via auto provisioning.

step.cmd: Go to Auto Provisioning Firmware Upgrade , the page displays the auto provisioned phone models.
Click the Upgrade To drop-down menu, check if the phones have new firmware version available.
step.info: If the phone has new firmware version, you can see the version in the drop-down menu.

step.cmd: Select a firmware version that you want to upgrade to.
Reboot the phone(s) and update the firmware.
